amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to state that communities impacted by contamination of the chemical GenX are eligible for certain grants under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to state that communities impacted by contamination of the chemical GenX are eligible for certain grants under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Hudson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
